item.text: Now Shephatiah son of Mattan, Gedaliah son of Pashhur, Jehucal son of Shelemiah, and Pashhur son of Malkijah had heard the things that Jeremiah had been telling the people. They had heard him say,
“The Lord says, ‘Those who stay in this city will die in battle or of starvation or disease. Those who leave the city and surrender to the Babylonians will live. They will escape with their lives.’”
They had also heard him say, “The Lord says, ‘This city will certainly be handed over to the army of the king of Babylon. They will capture it.’”

So these <st data-num="08269" class="">officials</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st>, “<st data-num="02088" class="">This</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> <st data-num="04994" class="">must</st> be <st data-num="04191" class="">put to death</st>. <st data-num="03588 05921 03651">For</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> is <st data-num="07503 03027">demoralizing</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="0376 04421">soldiers</st> who are <st data-num="07604" class="">left</st> in <st data-num="02063" class="">the</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> as well as <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the other <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> there by <st data-num="0428" class="">these</st> <st data-num="01697" class="">things</st> he is <st data-num="01696 0413">saying</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="02088" class="">This</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> <st data-num="0369" class="">is not</st> <st data-num="01875" class="">seeking</st> to <st data-num="07965" class="">help</st> <st data-num="02088" class="">these</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> <st data-num="03588 0518">but</st> is trying to <st data-num="07451" class="">harm</st> them.”<n id="4" />

<st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="06667" class="">Zedekiah</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> to them, “<st data-num="02009" class="">Very well</st>, you can <st data-num="03027" class="">do what</st> you <st data-num="03027" class="">want</st> with <st data-num="01931" class="">him</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">For</st> <st data-num="04428" class="">I</st> <st data-num="0369 03201">cannot do</st> <st data-num="01697" class="">anything</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">to stop</st> you.”<n id="2" />

So the officials took Jeremiah and put him in the cistern of Malkijah, one of the royal princes, that was in the courtyard of the guardhouse. There was no water in the cistern, only mud. So when they lowered Jeremiah into the cistern with ropes he sank in the mud.
An Ethiopian, Ebed Melech, a court official in the royal palace, heard that Jeremiah had been put in the cistern. While the king was holding court at the Benjamin Gate,

<st data-num="05663" class="">Ebed Melech</st> <st data-num="03318" class="">departed</st> the <st data-num="01004 04428">palace</st> and went to <st data-num="01696" class="">speak</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st>. He <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> to him,

“Your <st data-num="04428" class="">royal</st> <st data-num="0113" class="">Majesty</st>, <st data-num="0428" class="">those</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> have <st data-num="07489" class="">been</st> very <st data-num="07489" class="">wicked</st> in <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> they have <st data-num="06213" class="">done</st> to the <st data-num="05030" class="">prophet</st> <st data-num="03414" class="">Jeremiah</st>. They have <st data-num="07993" class="">thrown</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">him</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">into</st> a <st data-num="0953" class="">cistern</st>, and he is sure to <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">of</st> <st data-num="07458" class="">starvation</st> <st data-num="08478" class="">there</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> <st data-num="0369" class="">there is no</st> <st data-num="03899" class="">food</st> <st data-num="05750" class="">left</st> in the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st>.”<n id="1" />

Then the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> <st data-num="06680 0559">gave</st> <st data-num="05663" class="">Ebed Melech</st> the <st data-num="03569" class="">Ethiopian</st> <st data-num="06680 0559">the following order</st>: “<st data-num="03947" class="">Take</st> <st data-num="07970" class="">30</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> with <st data-num="03027" class="">you</st> from <st data-num="02088" class="">here</st> and go <st data-num="05927" class="">pull</st> the <st data-num="05030" class="">prophet</st> <st data-num="03414" class="">Jeremiah</st> <st data-num="05927" class="">out</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="0953" class="">cistern</st> <st data-num="02962" class="">before</st> he <st data-num="04191" class="">dies</st>.”

So <st data-num="05663" class="">Ebed Melech</st> <st data-num="03947" class="">took</st> the <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> with <st data-num="03027" class="">him</st> and <st data-num="0935" class="">went</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> a room <st data-num="08478" class="">under</st> the <st data-num="0214" class="">treasure room</st> in the <st data-num="01004 04428">palace</st>.<n id="1" /> He <st data-num="03947" class="">got</st> some <st data-num="01094" class="">worn-out</st> <st data-num="05499" class="">clothes</st> and <st data-num="01094" class="">old</st> <st data-num="04418" class="">rags</st><n id="2" /> from <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st> and <st data-num="07971" class="">let</st> them <st data-num="07971" class="">down</st> by <st data-num="02256" class="">ropes</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="03414" class="">Jeremiah</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="0953" class="">cistern</st>.

<st data-num="05663 03569">Ebed Melech</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0559" class="">called</st> down <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="03414" class="">Jeremiah</st>, “<st data-num="07760 04994">Put</st> these <st data-num="05499" class="">rags</st> and <st data-num="01094" class="">worn-out</st> <st data-num="04418" class="">clothes</st> <st data-num="08478" class="">under</st> your <st data-num="0679 03027">armpits</st> <st data-num="08478" class="">to pad</st> the <st data-num="02256" class="">ropes</st>.”<n id="2" /> <st data-num="03414" class="">Jeremiah</st> <st data-num="06213" class="">did</st> <st data-num="03651" class="">as</st> Ebed Melech <st data-num="03651" class="">instructed</st>.<n id="3" />
So they pulled Jeremiah up from the cistern with ropes. Jeremiah, however, still remained confined to the courtyard of the guardhouse.

Some time later Zedekiah sent and had Jeremiah brought to him at the third entrance of the Lord’s temple. The king said to Jeremiah, “I would like to ask you a question. Do not hide anything from me when you answer.”

<st data-num="03414" class="">Jeremiah</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="06667" class="">Zedekiah</st>, “<st data-num="03588" class="">If</st> I <st data-num="05046" class="">answer</st> you, you will <st data-num="03808 04191">certainly</st> <st data-num="04191" class="">kill</st> me.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">If</st> I <st data-num="03289" class="">give</st> you <st data-num="03289" class="">advice</st>, you will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="08085" class="">listen</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> me.”

So King Zedekiah made a secret promise to Jeremiah and sealed it with an oath. He promised, “As surely as the Lord lives who has given us life and breath, I promise you this: I will not kill you or hand you over to those men who want to kill you.”

Then Jeremiah said to Zedekiah, “The Lord God of Heaven’s Armies, the God of Israel, says, ‘You must surrender to the officers of the king of Babylon. If you do, your life will be spared and this city will not be burned down. Indeed, you and your whole family will be spared.

But <st data-num="0518" class="">if</st> you do <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03318" class="">surrender</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="08269" class="">officers</st> of the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> of <st data-num="0894" class="">Babylon</st>, <st data-num="02063" class="">this</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> will be <st data-num="05414" class="">handed</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">over to</st> the <st data-num="03778" class="">Babylonians</st>,<n id="1" /> and they will <st data-num="08313" class="">burn</st> it <st data-num="0784" class="">down</st>. You <st data-num="0859" class="">yourself</st> will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="04422" class="">escape</st> from <st data-num="03027" class="">them</st>.’”<n id="2" />

Then <st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="06667" class="">Zedekiah</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="03414" class="">Jeremiah</st>, “<st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> <st data-num="01672" class="">am afraid</st> of the <st data-num="03064" class="">Judeans</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> have <st data-num="05307" class="">deserted</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="03778" class="">Babylonians</st>.<n id="1" /> The Babylonians <st data-num="06435" class="">might</st> <st data-num="05414" class="">hand</st> me <st data-num="03027" class="">over to</st> them, and they will <st data-num="05953" class="">torture</st> me.”<n id="2" />
Then Jeremiah answered, “You will not be handed over to them. Please obey the Lord by doing what I have been telling you. Then all will go well with you, and your life will be spared.
But if you refuse to surrender, the Lord has shown me a vision of what will happen. Here is what I saw:

All the women who are left in the royal palace of Judah will be led out to the officers of the king of Babylon. They will taunt you saying:

“‘Your trusted friends misled you;

they have gotten the best of you.

Now that your feet are stuck in the mud,

they have turned their backs on you.’
“All your wives and your children will be turned over to the Babylonians. You yourself will not escape from them but will be captured by the king of Babylon. This city will be burned down.”
Then Zedekiah told Jeremiah, “Do not let anyone know about the conversation we have had. If you do, you will die.

The <st data-num="08269" class="">officials</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">may</st> <st data-num="08085" class="">hear</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> I have <st data-num="01696" class="">talked</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> you. They may <st data-num="0935" class="">come</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> you and <st data-num="0559 0413">say</st>, ‘<st data-num="05046 04994">Tell</st> us <st data-num="04100" class="">what</st> you <st data-num="01696" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> and <st data-num="04100" class="">what</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> <st data-num="01696" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> you.<n id="1" /> Do <st data-num="0408" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03582" class="">hide</st> anything <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> us. <st data-num="03808" class="">If</st> you <st data-num="03808" class="">do</st>, we will <st data-num="04191" class="">kill</st> you.’<n id="2" />

If they do this, <st data-num="0559 0413">tell</st><n id="1" /> them, ‘<st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> was <st data-num="05307 08467">pleading</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> <st data-num="01115" class="">not</st> to <st data-num="07725" class="">send</st> me <st data-num="07725" class="">back</st> to <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st> <st data-num="08033" class="">in the dungeon of</st> <st data-num="03083" class="">Jonathan’s</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>.’”<n id="2" />

<st data-num="03605" class="">All</st> the <st data-num="08269" class="">officials</st> did indeed <st data-num="0935 0413">come</st> and <st data-num="07592" class="">question</st> <st data-num="03414" class="">Jeremiah</st>.<n id="1" /> He <st data-num="05046" class="">told</st> <st data-num="01992" class="">them</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">exactly</st> <st data-num="01697 0428 0834">what</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> had <st data-num="06680" class="">instructed</st> him to say.<n id="2" /> They <st data-num="02790 04480">stopped questioning</st> him any further <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">no</st> one had actually <st data-num="08085" class="">heard</st> their <st data-num="01697" class="">conversation</st>.<n id="3" />

So Jeremiah remained confined in the courtyard of the guardhouse until the day Jerusalem was captured.

The following events occurred when Jerusalem was captured.
